participant_1.background:
I want to show off my new earrings to my friends.
I'm proud of who I am, and I'm not going to let my vision impairment stop me from living my life to the fullest.
my ultimate dream , however , is to be a writer.
i drive a ford taurus.
i like to sing broadway show tunes.

participant_2.background:
I am a mystery buff and live in London.
I am not rich, but I am fortunate enough to have parents who support my passion for filmmaking.
I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots.
I have a collection of rocks and minerals from all over the world.
I wake up early, work a full day, then practice my music in the evening.

content.text: I am doing great! I just got some new earrings and I am excited to show them off to my friends.
That is awesome! I love getting new jewelry. What kind of earrings did you get?
They are a pair of pearl earrings. I love how they look on me.
Pearls are always a classic choice. They look really nice on you.
Thanks! I am really happy with them.
What are you up to today?
Not much. Just hanging out and relaxing. I might go for a walk later.
That sounds like a good plan. I have to work today, but I am looking forward to going home and practicing my music.
What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and the piano. I also sing a little bit.
That is awesome! I love music. I am not very good at playing any instruments, but I love to sing.
